mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE (PK_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLIC_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DEL) VALUES (#{pkId}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publicFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, '0')
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM article w WHERE w.delete_status = '1'

SELECT T1.PK_ID, T1.TITLE, T1.AUTHOR, T2.USER_NAME AS AUTHOR_NAME, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME FROM ARTICLE T1 LEFT JOIN SYS_USER T2 ON T1.AUTHOR = T2.USER_ID AND T2.IS_DEL = '0' WHERE T1.IS_DEL = '0'
AND (T1.PUBLIC_FLAG = '1' OR T1.AUTHOR = #{userId})
ORDER BY T1.CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT T2.PK_ID, T1.TITLE, T2.CONTENT FROM ARTICLE T1 LEFT JOIN ARTICLE_CONTENT T2 ON T1.PK_ID = T2.ARTICLE_ID WHERE T1.PK_ID = #{articleId} AND T2.DRAFT = #{draft}
SELECT count(0) FROM ARTICLE_CONTENT WHERE PK_ID = #{articleId} AND DRAFT = '0'
SELECT PK_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLIC_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM ARTICLE WHERE PK_ID = #{articleId}
